extension.summary: Fetch TV Show metadata from TVmaze.com
extension.description: TVmaze is a free user driven TV database curated by TV lovers all over the world. You can track your favorite shows from anywhere. We provide an API that can be used by anyone or service like Kodi to retrieve TV Metadata, show/episode/cast images, and much more.
extension.news:
1.1.2: - Performance optimization.
1.1.1: - Fixed scraping some alternative episode orders. - Fixed compatibility with Kodi 20 "N". - Reworked caching mechanism.
